scripts.build-dev: rm -rf dist && ng build --configuration dev --outputHashing=all --aot && npm run copy-version-dev
scripts.build-hom: rm -rf dist && ng build --configuration hom --outputHashing=all --aot && npm run copy-version-hom
scripts.build-prod: rm -rf dist && ng build --configuration production && npm run copy-version-prod
scripts.publish:dev: npm run publish:checkout-dev && npm run release:fetch-tags && npm version prerelease --preid=dev && npm run release:push-tags && npm run build-dev && npm run release:perform
scripts.publish:hom: npm run publish:checkout-hom && npm run release:fetch-tags && npm version prerelease --preid=hom && npm run release:push-tags && npm run build-hom && npm run release:perform
scripts.publish:prod-version: npm run publish:checkout-prod && npm run release:fetch-tags && npm run publish:version && npm run release:push-tags && npm run build-prod && npm run release:perform
scripts.publish:prod-version-minor: npm run publish:checkout-prod && npm run release:fetch-tags && npm run publish:version-minor && npm run release:push-tags && npm run build-prod && npm run release:perform
scripts.publish:prod-version-patch: npm run publish:checkout-prod && npm run release:fetch-tags && npm run publish:version-patch && npm run release:push-tags && npm run build-prod && npm run release:perform
